data.message: I just spent 20 frustrating and ultimately futile minutes trying to format a post to reflect what I actually want (text on a black background) rather than your programmers' ideas of what I should want (your incredibly lame "recommendations" map). I really wish you'd let members think for themselves.

replies.message: Hi Peter. We're sorry to hear that. If you have any feedback you'd like to share with our team, please let us know here: http://bit.ly/2sKX8e4. Feedback from our community helps us continue to improve Facebook for everyone. -Jessica

Yeah... I wanted Facebook to look red but they had went against my wishes and made it blue. I spent 21 frustrating minutes trying to figure out how to change the Facebook font to be helvetica but Facebook wants to ruin everyone's lives by choosing the font for us... I don't want this font. Also I want the text window to be a circle but it's a square. Facebook can u fix these problems? It's a big problem.
Wow try not to be son mean!!
What u talkin bout SON?! Lol
